title: I lost 3250 RP
body: today I bought 3250 RP with 20 euros and I didnt get any RP and thats alot of money please help me

replies.body:
Are you still having this issue? If so, our server may have hiccupped and missed the RP transfer. In this situation, I'd reach out to our billing specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get this sorted out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I really need help with that, someone please help me
I restarded my client 5 times and I didnt get it
relogg, you´ll get it dont worry
